alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 08 at 3:31AM CST until January 09 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...In Oklahoma, Beaver County. In Texas, Lipscomb and Ochiltree Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. In Oklahoma, call 844-465-4997 for road information. In Texas, call 800-452-9292 for road information.
